item.title: Hays 10-130 Chevy Steel Flywheel
item.description: Hays Steel Flywheels are manufactured from certified billet material that will not break up under the stress of high RPM and severe punishment of racing.Precision balanced to either neutral (internal) or Detroit (external) specificationsMeets SFI specification 1.1 for racingHays Steel Flywheels are manufactured from certified billet material that will not break up under the stress of high RPM and severe punishment of racing. Available in weights up to 50 pounds for specialized applications, most Hays Flywheels are drilled with both the Borg Beck and Long-Style clutch pattern. Hays flywheels are certified under SFI spec 1.1. Part No. 10-130 is a neutral (zero) balanced flywheel for internal balancing. Application: Chevy 1955-85 All V8 with large bellhousing except 400 454. Pressure Plate Pattern: Borg BeckDiaphragm 10.5" Borg BeckLongMK-XII 11", Ring Gear Teeth: 168, Weight: 30.Model Number: 10-130

item.title: Hays 10-132 Chevy Steel Flywheel
item.description: Hays Steel Flywheels are manufactured from certified billet material that will not break up under the stress of high RPM and severe punishment of racing.Precision balanced to either neutral (internal) or Detroit (external) specificationsMeets SFI specification 1.1 for racingHays Steel Flywheels are manufactured from certified billet material that will not break up under the stress of high RPM and severe punishment of racing. Available in weights up to 50 pounds for specialized applications, most Hays Flywheels are drilled with both the Borg Beck and Long-Style clutch pattern. Hays flywheels are certified under SFI spec 1.1. Part No. 10-132 is a "Detroit Balance" flywheel, externally balanced to stock (counterweighted) specs. Application: Chevy 1970-78 400 with large bellhousing. Pressure Plate Pattern: Borg BeckDiaphragm 10.5" Borg BeckDiaphragmLong 11", Ring Gear Teeth: 168, Weight: 30.Model Number: 10-132

item.title: Hays 13-130 Pontiac Steel Flywheel
item.description: Hays Steel Flywheels are manufactured from certified billet material that will not break up under the stress of high RPM and severe punishment of racing.Precision balanced to either neutral (internal) or Detroit (external) specificationsMeets SFI specification 1.1 for racingHays Steel Flywheels are manufactured from certified billet material that will not break up under the stress of high RPM and severe punishment of racing. Available in weights up to 50 pounds for specialized applications, most Hays Flywheels are drilled with both the Borg Beck and Long-Style clutch pattern. Hays flywheels are certified under SFI spec 1.1. Part No. 13-130 is a neutral (zero) balanced flywheel for internal balancing. Application: Pontiac 1964-76 V8 wlarge register bore (2.75). Pressure Plate Pattern: Borg BeckDiaphragm 10.5" Borg BeckDiaphragmMark-XII 11", Ring Gear Teeth: 166, Weight: 30.Model Number: 13-130

item.title: Hays 20-130 Chevy Aluminum Flywheel
item.description: Hays aluminum flywheels are manufactured from certified billet material that will not break up under the stress of high RPM and severe punishment of racing. Featues replaceable steel surface insert.Precision balanced to either neutral (internal) or Detroit (external) specificationsMeets SFI specification 1.1 for racingHays Aluminum Flywheels, the favorite choice of many road racers, are also popular with the serious drag racer running a light car and large cubic inch motor. Machined from 7075 T-6 forged billet aluminum, this high strength alloy surpasses all material specs as to strength and centrifugal distortion. All Hays Aluminum Flywheels feature a replaceable steel or bronze heat shield friction surface and are drilled to accept either the Borg Beck or Long-Style clutch pattern. The ring gear is securely mounted with welded tabs that are riveted to the flywheel to prevent spinning. Hays flywheels are certified under S.F.I. spec 1.1. Part No. 20-130 is a neutral (zero) balanced flywheel for internal balancing. Application: Chevy 1955-85 All V8 with large bellhousing except 400 454. Pressure Plate Pattern: Borg Beck Diaphragm 10.5", Borg BeckLong MK-XII 11", Ring Gear Teeth: 168, Weight: 15.Model Number: 20-130

item.title: Hays 85-100 GM 10.5 Street Clutch Kit
item.description: Matched assembly for maximum reliabilityAn excellent choice for high performance street applicationsSee catalog for complete applications and specificationsEngineered to handle the increased horsepower and torque of a modified engine, these performance clutch kits are the answer to clutch problems in today's muscle cars that are equipped with turbos or nitrous systems. Each kit contains a high performance diaphragm pressure plate to retain the factory pedal pressure and a sintered metallic button style clutch disc to increase the coefficient of friction for reduced slippage and greater holding power. Kit includes:Pressure Plate, Throwout Bearing, Disc, Alignment Tool bolt kit. Part No. 85-100 utilizes a 10.5" diaphragm style clutch with a 1 18-10 spline. SEE CATALOG for applications. Diaphragm, 10.5", 1 18-10 Spline.Model Number: 85-100
